price: Nokorε sε wͻn a wͻbͻ hu wͻ wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn ho suro (nti),
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
